name: Are You There? (JackieFuChan616)
description:
You have suddenly appeared in an isolated room with a bunch of pads that can transport you other places. Are there others out there? You'll just have to find out to solve the mystery of this place.

Press C to interact with objects and collected artifacts, diary pages, and party members. 

Created by Jack Furmanek, Violet Veline, and Terry Yuan

Minor assets for trees comes from Low Poly Tree Pack by Broken Vector: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/low-poly-tree-pack-57866
